data.text:
Hello Everyone,

I just installed batocera and few games in it. When i start games in some bigger emulator like Playstation 1, PSP, Wii U they run just fine but I can’t able to quit the emulator with pressing esc button. I have to force shut down my pc to boot batocera again.

Anyone knows how to quit running emulator and get back main screen of Batocera?

As Joinski said, use the built-in hotkeys on your controller.

But if you absolutely must use the keyboard, usually Alt + F4 works. Not all emulators respect this though, depending on the emulator (the reason to use a game pad in the first place…).
